welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mount Vernon, where the historic charm of George Washington's beloved home meets the beauty of the Potomac River. Get ready to explore our quaint city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is one of the largest in the airport and serves a variety of airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal is used exclusively by JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily British Airways and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal is used by American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, exclusively serving United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
